original_title: Sesame Street: Elmo & Tango: Furry Friends Forever
overview: Friendships are about to get even FURRIER on Sesame Street! Elmo, everyone's favorite red monster, adopted a puppy named Tango. Meet Elmo's music-loving, smart, and energetic puppy and even more of his paw-fect furry friends in the neighborhood. Special guests include Jon Batiste, Kacey Musgraves, and Keke Palmer.
title: Sesame Street: Elmo & Tango: Furry Friends Forever
